scripts.build: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:backend
scripts.setup: pnpm install && concurrently "cd irenes-circus-frontend && pnpm install" "cd irenes-circus-backend && pnpm install"
scripts.audit: concurrently "cd irenes-circus-frontend && pnpm audit" "cd irenes-circus-backend && pnpm audit"
scripts.audit:fix: concurrently "cd irenes-circus-frontend && pnpm audit --fix" "cd irenes-circus-backend && pnpm audit --fix"
scripts.security:check: echo 'Running security checks...' && pnpm audit && echo 'Security check completed!'
